Room.Name: Main Courtyard/Apstone Tunnel Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the southeast corner of the courtyard, near Apstone Tunnel.
Room.LongDescription: The tunnel you see leads to the eastern interior of the castle. The chief wizard of the castle, Apstone, maintains quarters just off the north side of the tunnel. South of you are the castle stables, where most of the war horses are kept. There are other steeds and mounts there as well.
